name: BDocMenu
desc: List menu items with single and multiple choice.

infoArray.name: menuItemlist
infoArray.desc: List of menu items. If there is only one item in array, all of subtitle are listed directly. But if there are more than 1 item, the titles are loaded on a dropdown list. The subtitles of title are listed, when title selected from dropdown list.

infoArray.name: selectedTitle
infoArray.desc: For select title from dropdown list. If menuItemList contains more than 1 item, this property can be filled,.
